Yasağımın incelenmesini ve kaldırılmasını istiyorum.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Another player who cheated in my competitive match with my friend in CS GO came, even though we wanted to kick out with my friend, other players prevented us from throwing, I did not leave the game in order not to eat temporary ban, after a while I got a ban from VAC and there was no explanation about it. . I want my ban to be reviewed and lifted.

It's a good game, very addictive, and mostly very strategic. There's a lot of opportunity to practice outside of real matches so being a new player can be fun and less intimidating than some other shooter games, but I don't recommend playing competitive until you have 50+ hours in the game and are really familiar with all the fundamental game mechanics. Unfortunately, there are a lot of hackers in csgo, and unless you do prime matchmaking, you'll run into them frequently, and while there is a decent anti-cheat system in csgo, it could be better. Otherwise though, the game is very addictive and overall fun. 

I'd give csgo an 8/10 rating.
